prompt: Design a vibrant drawer menu with cream background and orange app bar. Include header with circular avatar (user icon), username 'Liam Davis' in bold white, and email 'liam.davis@example.com' in light gray. Add divider and menu items: Dashboard (dashboard), Profile (person outline), Settings (settings), Help (help outline), Logout (logout). Use ListTiles with orange icons and bold text, adding slight shadow effect to drawer. Main content displays centered welcome message in orange with gray subtitle, and includes floating action button (plus icon) for adding content. Apply Material Design with 16px padding and consistent spacing.
